moduleMeta.name: asciiGridOutput
moduleMeta.author: longyinping11@lzb.ac.cn
moduleMeta.description: output a 2D array in ascii grid format

var.name: baseMap
var.description: a 2D array that dipicts the study area extent

var.name: value
var.description: a 2D array that will be output

var.name: nrows
var.description: the nrows value in the ascii file

var.name: ncols
var.description: the ncols value in the ascii file

var.name: xllcorner
var.description: the xllcorner value in the ascii file

var.name: yllcorner
var.description: the yllcorner value in the ascii file

var.name: cellsize
var.description: the cellsize value in the ascii file

var.name: nodata
var.description: the nodata value in the ascii file
